application.name: messckgen
application.description: Generates MESSENGER CKs from previous CK DB file, along with the latest pivot and attitude history DB files.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: The CK PVL group DB file used to generate the new DB file. Defaulted to use $ISIS3DATA/messenger/kernels/ck/kernels.????.db. This file is primarily used to extract formatting and old groups that need to be updated and transferred to the new CK DB file.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: The new DB file that is the matching CK file. Defaulted to use $ISIS3DATA/messenger/kernels/ck/kernels.????.db.

parameter.name: PIVOT
parameter.description: The latest CK pivot file used to extract new date ranges and the latest pivot file. Defaulted to use $ISIS3DATA/messenger/kernels/ck/pivot_kernels.????.db.

parameter.name: ATTHIST
parameter.description: The latest CK pivot file used to extract new date ranges and the latest attitude history file. Defaulted to use $ISIS3DATA/messenger/kernels/ck/atthist_kernels.????.db.
